name: Starter Pack
description: A few simple recipes to get you started on your culinary journey.

recipes.title: Simple Scrambled Eggs
instructions: Whisk eggs and milk together in a bowl.
Melt butter in a non-stick skillet over medium heat.
Pour in the egg mixture and cook, stirring gently, until cooked to your liking.

recipes.title: Classic Grilled Cheese
recipes.summary: A golden, cheesy, and comforting classic.
instructions: Butter one side of each slice of bread.
Place one slice, butter-side down, in a skillet over medium heat.
Top with cheese, then the other slice of bread, butter-side up.
Grill for 3-4 minutes per side, until golden brown and the cheese is melted.
